attributes.action: Ban people who wear tracksuits or hoodies from entering Job centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would dramatically reduce the amount of money the government has to pay out in benefits, and the saving could be spent on hiring more nurses for the NHS.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
